data.text: @SunSentinel We have been masked for over two years. Can anyone point to a scientific study that showed these masks worked?  N95 for everyone may have helped but I am talking about all the masks worn in general.
@SunSentinel We live in a free country!!!! I am allowed to use a mask if I choose to. DeSantis missed the Constitution discussion course while attending school.
@SunSentinel Some people can't let go of the drama and will probably decide to wear a mask for the rest of their lives. I, on the hand, will not.
@Anonymousdade @SunSentinel You know what's funny is that other people doing the things you are mocking literally have no impact in your life. You just want to police what other people do.

@Viking_Fist @PlantsSociety @SunSentinel Let me rephrase this to make sense for you. We have a fence around our pool but we still lock the gate when we have a party we can lose track of small children and wouldn't want them to drown.
@SunSentinel Because my brother started radiation and chemo and I donâ€™t want to kill him. Should I wear a sign?
@SunSentinel Riddle me this would you ask your surgeon that question?
